channel.title: (562)Admin's Can't Trade and Attack animation
channel.description: Hey i've been on google trying to look for solutions for the Admins can't trade enable but they don't work for me. the source is alhass and tkoscape. And for attack animation i keep punching with some of the sword's such as Korasi, D scimmy, D long etc and it rarely does the correct animation and i put the ids with the weps id's to the line in Equipment.java that has the properly working animation like iron scimmy and rune scimmy....

item.title: (562)Admin's Can't Trade and Attack animation
item.dc:creator: @Vodzila Vodzila
item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

Hey i’ve been on google trying to look for solutions for the Admins can’t trade enable but they don’t work for me. the source is alhass and tkoscape.
And for attack animation i keep punching with some of the sword’s such as Korasi, D scimmy, D long etc and it rarely does the correct animation and i put the ids with the weps id’s to the line in Equipment.java that has the properly working animation like iron scimmy and rune scimmy…
